name: Gudiya
description:
Madhya Pradesh is a state known for its unique handicrafts. Once you delve deep into the mesmerizing world of handicrafts of Madhya Pradesh, you will come across several tribal villages, where handicrafts are not only a source of livelihood for the people living there but also a source of their identity for them.

Follow the story of Gudiya - a tribal kid of Madhya Pradesh who helps her family earn a livelihood by collecting raw materials across her village and returning back to her hut to make and sell Handicrafts.
